## MinedReceipt type

Either a [FailedReceipt](./rmm-ethers.failedreceipt.md) or a [SuccessfulReceipt](./rmm-ethers.successfulreceipt.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MinedReceipt<R = unknown, D = unknown> = FailedReceipt<R> | SuccessfulReceipt<R, D>;
```
<b>References:</b> [FailedReceipt](./rmm-ethers.failedreceipt.md)<!-- -->, [SuccessfulReceipt](./rmm-ethers.successfulreceipt.md)

## Remarks

If successful receipt, a parse method can be passed to return useful details about the transaction, used as `D`<!-- -->.
